titleNullable: Classifying or Clustering English News Articles
descriptionNullable:
We collected data from English news websites in Sri Lanka. There are 800 articles collected from the Daily Mirror,The Island, News First and Ceylon Today websites. The news dataset contains five categories as follows business, technology, politics, sports and health. Our collected news articles contain 160 articles per category and the news articles are equally divided into each domain. 
One dataset contains only the headings of the articles and another dataset contains the body of the articles.

Publications:
1 - N. Disayiram and R. A. H. M. Rupasingha, "A Comparative Study of Clustering English News Articles Using Clustering Algorithms," 2022 International Research Conference on Smart Computing and Systems Engineering (SCSE), IEEE, 2022, pp. 108-113, doi: [10.1109/SCSE56529.2022.9905210] https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9905210/)

2- N. Disayiram and R. A. H. M. Rupasingha, "A Comparative Study of Classifying English News Articles Using Machine Learning Algorithms," 2022 Trends in Electrical, Electronics, Computer Engineering Conference (TEECCON), 2022, pp. 50-55, doi: [10.1109/TEECCON54414.2022.9854832] https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9854832)
